title: Obby: Legendary Dragon
description: Obby: Legendary Dragon is a thrilling adventure battle game where you are on an epic quest to capture extraordinary creatures across fantastical worlds. Run through from enchanted forests to mystical mountains, each brimming with hundreds of stunning animals just waiting to be discovered. Get ready to hone your skills and grow your creatures through countless levels. With each step, youâ€™ll forge friendships with fellow adventurers and uncover delightful surprises.
